name: mysql-repl-mon
short_description: Python port of Michal Ludvigs mysql replication slave monitoring.  This operates mostly as a plugin for Zenoss but should output in a Nagios friendly format as well.  This exists because I am a big fan of python and wanted to use that over perl.
